tagline: Breaking barriers with voice, video, and sign language.
how_can_help: How can we help you communicate today?
sign_language_to_voice_desc: Convert sign language gestures into clear spoken words in real-time
voice_to_avatar_desc: Transform your voice into an animated signing avatar instantly
video_to_avatar_desc: Upload videos and generate dynamic signing avatars
voice_to_sign_sign_to_voice:
Voice to Sign,
Sign to Voice
onboarding_desc: Instantly translate sign language gestures into clear spoken words, and convert voice into an animated avatar.
how_it_works_desc: Seamless communication tools designed to bridge the gap between sign language and spoken words.
sign_to_voice_feature_desc: Translate gestures into spoken words instantly using AI recognition.
voice_to_avatar_feature_desc: Convert speech into a realistic 3D signing avatar in real-time.
video_to_avatar_feature_desc: Upload videos to generate dynamic signing animations automatically.
